Harold McNish

  1. Alternate Birth Name: McNeish
  2. Foster Name: Harold A. Dravo
  3. Foster Family: Samuel and Amanda Dravo
  4. Location of Family: Holdrege, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Holdrege, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  8. Date of Birth: 1899-08-04, Brooklyn, NY
  9. Date of Death: 9/19/1953, Portland, OR
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: OTR 40; Eloise Thomsen Corres.; Find-A-Grave; 1900 United States Federal Census; Holdredge newspaper (unidentified), 6 August 1908; 1920 United States Federal Census; National Orphan Train Complex; The Holdrege Citizen, 13 August 1908.
